## The data file:

```{r eval = TRUE, include=TRUE,echo=FALSE }
library(knitr)
opts_chunk$set(fig.width = 12, fig.height = 8, echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE)
ts <- readLines("../../examples/bbrkc/OneSex/bbrkc_ss.dat")
for (i in 1:length(ts)) cat(ts[i], "\n")
```
